name: Global uniques
uniques: [-75]% growth [in all cities] <when between [-10] and [-1] Happiness>
Nullifies Growth [in all cities] <when below [-10] Happiness>
Rebel units may spawn <when below [-20] Happiness>
Can instantly construct a [Weather] improvement <in tiles without [Weather]> <with [90]% chance>
Turn this tile into a [Grassland] tile <in [Weather] tiles> <after [2] turns>
Neighboring tiles will convert to [Weather] <with [30]% chance> <with [1] to [5] neighboring [Weather] tiles> <within [1] tiles of a [Weather]> <upon turn end>
